text: Capurganá Airport is an airport serving the Caribbean coastal town of Capurganá in the Chocó Department of Colombia. No roads go to Capurganá, so boats and aircraft are the primary means in and out. The runway is east of Colombia's border with Panama, with high terrain off the southern end. North arrivals and departures are over the water. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Capurganá *OurAirports - Capurganá *FallingRain - Capurganá Airport * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Capurganá Airport
